body:
im quiting avicus also MineCraft, same reason as porky, I'm not doing YouTube anymore either. I've found a way out of a minecraft and spending 4-6 hours on my computer everyday, it wasn't fun. If you want to stay in touch add me on skype but that's the only way you will be able to contact me.


Ive also made some great friends on the avicus server. It was a pleasure to play, but things are meant to happen. Hope you all enjoy your time. 
Signing out
~BioNicBhawk

title: Bye avicus/ minecraft

Good luck with everything in life :)
